query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST630
SET CS630_DEL = 'Y'
WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS630_TEM = #CS630_TEM# AND CS630_RDT = #CS630_RDT# AND CS630_SEQ = #CS630_SEQ# AND CS630_UPN = #CS630_UPN# AND CS630_CST = #CS630_CST# AND CS630_GNO = #CS630_GNO# AND CS630_JSQ = #CS630_JSQ# AND CS630_PST = 'A1' AND CS630_DEL = ''
